H2O.description: H2O is a fast and secure HTTP/2 server written in C by Kazuho Oku.

HCL Digital Experience.description: HCL Digital Experience software empowers you to create, manage and deliver engaging omni-channel digital experiences to virtually all audiences.

HCL Domino.description: HCL Domino, formerly called IBM Domino (1995) and Lotus Domino (1989), is an enterprise server application development platform.

HP iLO.description: HP iLO is a tool that provides multiple ways to configure, update, monitor, and run servers remotely.

Halo.description: Halo is a powerful, user-friendly open-source website building tool that supports dynamic themes, real-time editing, and multilingual setups.

Hammer.js.description: Hammer.js is a JavaScript library for adding touch gestures like swipe, pinch, and rotate to web applications.

Handlebars.description: Handlebars is a JavaScript library used to create reusable webpage templates.

Handsontable.description: Handsontable is a JavaScript component that combines data grid features with spreadsheet-like UX.

Hatena Blog.description: Hatena Blog is one of the traditional blog platforms in Japan.

HeadJS.description: HeadJS is a JavaScript library that optimizes web performance by managing the loading and execution of scripts and stylesheets to ensure faster page loads and efficient resource handling.

Headless UI.description: Headless UI is an unstyled component library for either React.js or Vue.js from the same people that created Tailwind CSS.

Hexo.description: Hexo is a blog framework powered by Node.js.

Hiawatha.description: Hiawatha is a secure, lightweight web server developed by Hugo Leisink, designed for ease of use and advanced security features such as protection against SQL injections, XSS, and CSRF attacks.

Highlight.js.description: Highlight.js is a JavaScript library for syntax highlighting, supporting 192 languages and 496 themes.

Hocalwire.description: Hocalwire is a simplified newsroom CMS platform focused on Digital Media Publishers.

Hogan.js.description: Hogan.js is a JavaScript templating engine developed by Twitter, designed for both client-side and server-side applications, and it follows the Mustache template syntax for efficient and flexible template rendering.

Holduix CMS.description: Holduix CMS is a lightweight content management solution designed to offer developers and end users a customizable experience.

Hosttech Website Creator.description: Hosttech Website Creator is a web development tool by the Swiss company Hosttech, providing customizable templates and website management features.

Howler.js.description: Howler.js is an audio library with support for the Web Audio API and a fallback mechanism for HTML5 Audio.

Htmx.description: Htmx is a JavaScript library for performing AJAX requests, triggering CSS transitions, and invoking WebSocket and server-sent events directly from HTML elements.

HubSpot CMS Hub.description: CMS Hub is a content management platform by HubSpot for marketers to manage, optimize, and track content performance on websites, blogs, and landing pages.

Hubb.description: Hubb is an all-in-one integrated system designed for churches, enabling website content management without the need for technical expertise.

Huberway.description: Huberway is a content management system, based on PHP and JavaScript, used to create advanced sales portals oriented towards industrialization 4.0.

Hugo.description: Hugo is an open-source static site generator written in Go.

Hydra-Shield.description: Hydra-Shield is an anti-DDoS protection reverse proxy that filters and mitigates malicious traffic to safeguard servers from distributed denial-of-service attacks.

Hydrogen.description: Hydrogen is a front-end web development framework used for building Shopify custom storefronts.

Hypercorn.description: Hypercorn is an ASGI web server that supports HTTP/1, HTTP/2, WebSockets, ASGI/2, and ASGI/3 specifications, and can utilize asyncio, uvloop, or trio for asynchronous operations.
